Context: George Brown Archives maintains and provides access to the collegeâ€™s records, with approximately 3,700 linear metres stored at Casa Loma Campus and an offsite facility. The research/reading room is open by appointment, contact Archivist Clay Thibodeau at Tel: (416) 415-5000 Ext. 4771 or Fax: 416-415-4772 or email cthibodeau@georgebrown.ca for inquiries and appointments. Researchers must fill out a registration form on their first visit, and duplication services are available with prior arrangements. Records held offsite require one business day for delivery. The contact number for general college inquiries is 416-415-2000 with TTY: 1-877-515-5559 and email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. George Brown Archives are open to all researchers by appointment.
